definition: to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Interphase is divisible into various stages each characterized by a differing physiological activity.
sentences.chinese: 根據細胞生理活性差異可以把間期分成不同的階段。

sentences.english: Thus, the inside of the body is divided into four sections.
sentences.chinese: 因此，主體的內部分成四個區部。

sentences.english: How do you divide the line into 20 pieces?
sentences.chinese: 你如何把這段線分成二十段？

sentences.english: The company was divided into blue and pan-green camp.
sentences.chinese: 公司被分成藍軍和綠軍。

sentences.english: Eggs are graded from small to extra - large.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋從小的到特大的分成了等級。

sentences.english: This room, for example, into zillions of tiny little elements.
sentences.chinese: 比方說我們可以把這間屋子，分成大量的小單元。

sentences.english: Surface image was divided into two parts: foamed mask region and soleplate region.
sentences.chinese: 首先將表面圖像分成泡罩區和底板區兩部分。

sentences.english: His heart has divided into four chambers and its valves are beginning to form.
sentences.chinese: 他的心臟已經分成了四個腔室，瓣膜也開始形成了。

sentences.english: This parameter is calculated by first dividing learners into thirds based on the overall score in the quiz.
sentences.chinese: 首先根據測驗的總成績將學習者分成三組來測算母數。

sentences.english: The scouts paired off and began to patrol the area.
sentences.chinese: 偵察員們分成兩人一組，開始巡邏這一地區。

sentences.english: The pizza was quartered into six pieces.
Any parcel over the dimension limit should be repacked into smaller ones.
sentences.chinese: 超過最大尺寸限度的包裹應分成若干小件。

sentences.english: The teacher paired off his students by age and height.
sentences.chinese: 老師根據年齡和高矮將學生分成一對一對。

sentences.english: The massecuite thus obtained is then separated into anhydrous crystals of maltitol and mother liquor by conventional separation methods.
sentences.chinese: 結晶糖膏用常規有分離設備分成麥芽糖醇晶體和母液。

sentences.english: The plastic container is five times lighter than that glass one.
sentences.chinese: 這個塑料容器比那個玻璃容器輕六分成之五。

sentences.english: After this point, Grail literature divides into two classes.
sentences.chinese: 從這以後，聖盃文學作品分成了兩類。

definition: one divides into two/to be two-sided/there are two sides to everything/to see both sb's good points and shortcomings (idiom)
to distribute/to assign/to allocate/to partition (a hard drive)
